---
title: "Example for Usage: Tips"
format: native
# filters: 
#   - custom-numbered-blocks
custom-numbered-blocks:
   styles:
      - default:
        color: "#909090"
        boxtype: "fallback"
      - important:  [color = "red]
      - lifehack: [color = "green"]
      - postit: [color = "yellow", boxtype = "simpletextbox"]
   groups:
      tips:
        boxtype: "foldbox"
      info: [numbered = "false"]  
   classes: 
      - Tip:
          group: tips   
      - ImportantTip:
          group: tips
          style: important
          label: "Tip (important!)"
          reflabel: "important Tip"
      - Lifehack:
          group: tips  
          style: lifehack
          lable: "Tip (lifehack)"
          reflabel: "Lifehack"
      - Info:
          label: "Information" 
          reflabel: "Infobox"
      - Block: default
      - Postit:
          style: postit
          numbered: false 
---
